name: Thermostat Wars
description:
!Please remember to lower your volume before starting the game!
Controls:
WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
E to climb & interact
SPACE to pick up/place down
ESC to exit

You wake up from your cozy bed sweating like a sinner in church.
Somebody turned up the thermostat and you better turn it back down before you go back to bed, lest you fall asleep in your oatmeal next morning!
Only problem? You can't reach the thermostat - it's too high up!

This project was made for the Godot Wild Jam #53 with the theme "Assembly Required" and two extra wildcards: "Wait, What?" and "Thermometer".

Brought to you by Team E.F.F.O.R.T
> Programmers
Aiden Bratcher & Shinobi
> Audio Designers
Will Harder (Sound Effects) & snails.exe (Music)
> Art & Design
